item.title: Indian-origin CEO asks if he should get a green card. Elon Musk answers - India Today
item.description:
Indian-origin CEO asks if he should get a green card. Elon Musk answers.

Published On: Dec 15, 2024

Source: India Today

Indian-origin CEO Aravind Srinivas, who has been waiting three years for US citizenship, asked on X whether he should apply for a green card. Elon Musk responded with a simple “Yes,” igniting discussions on the platform.

  • Aravind Srinivas is the CEO of Perplexity AI, a company he founded in 2022.
  • He sought advice on whether to file for a green card due to his lengthy waiting period for citizenship.
  • Musk's reply received significant attention and support from social media users.
  • Days prior, Musk commented on the challenges posed by the US immigration system, highlighting the irony of criminal versus intellectual entry.
  • Srinivas has a strong academic background and experience at leading tech companies like Google and OpenAI.
“The system makes it easier for criminals to enter the country than it does for intellectuals or Nobel Laureates.” - Elon Musk

This interaction underscores ongoing concerns regarding the US immigration process, particularly for talented individuals. Musk's support may amplify discussions around reforming the system to benefit skilled immigrants.

Source: RushLane

Bajaj is set to launch a new version of the Chetak electric scooter on 20 December, which has been spotted testing prior to its official launch. This model is expected to be a more affordable version of the existing Chetak.

The upcoming Bajaj Chetak is anticipated to feature cost-cutting measures, and will likely be officially revealed in just a few days.

item.title: Last Chance To Buy Rs 50 Lakh SUV At Price Of Tata Nexon! - MotorOctane
item.description:
Last Chance To Buy Rs 50 Lakh SUV At Price Of Tata Nexon!

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: MotorOctane

Car buyers now have the opportunity to own a luxury SUV at an affordable price similar to that of a Tata Nexon, particularly highlighting the used Mercedes Benz GLA as an excellent option.

  • The used Mercedes Benz GLA is a luxury SUV available in the Indian market for approximately Rs 16.45 lakh.
  • It features a premium interior, muscular design, and various advanced features such as a panoramic sunroof and a Harman Kardon sound system.
  • Available engine options include a 2.0-litre petrol engine generating 181 bhp and a 2.2-litre diesel engine producing 135 bhp, both matched to a 7-speed DCT gearbox.
  • The GLA stands as a suitable alternative for those considering a Tata Nexon without sacrificing luxury.
"The used Mercedes Benz GLA will be a better and a feature-loaded option you could consider to buy instead of Tata Nexon."

When purchasing from the used car market, buyers are advised to thoroughly inspect vehicles for any damages or issues.

item.title: Masterstroke by Infosys as it acquires minority stake in this healthcare deep-tech firm, invests Rs… - India.com
item.description:
Masterstroke by Infosys as it acquires minority stake in this healthcare deep-tech firm, invests Rs…

Publication Date: December 13, 2024

Source: India.com

Indian multinational technology company Infosys has announced an investment of Rs 8 crore (approximately USD 1.0 million) in the healthcare startup 4baseCare, aimed at enhancing its capabilities in precision oncology.

  • Infosys invests Rs 8 crore in 4baseCare through its Innovation Fund.
  • The investment aims to improve cancer diagnosis and treatment using AI and analytics.
  • 4baseCare focuses on personalized cancer therapies with a technology-driven approach.
  • Infosys holds a minority stake of up to 20% in 4baseCare.
  • This partnership marks a strategic move to collaborate with AI and DeepTech startups.
“4baseCare provides unique precision oncology solutions leveraging diverse genomic and clinical data,” Infosys stated in its regulatory filing.

The collaboration between Infosys and 4baseCare highlights a commitment to innovation in healthcare, particularly in developing advanced solutions for cancer treatment.

item.title: After Kylaq, another compact SUV is coming. More problems for Brezza, Nexon, Venue? - India Today
item.description:
After Kylaq, another compact SUV is coming. More problems for Brezza, Nexon, Venue?

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: India Today

The compact SUV segment is seeing new entrants as Kia prepares to launch its latest model, the Syros, which aims to compete with established players like Brezza, Nexon, and Venue. The global debut is scheduled for December 19, 2024.

  • The Kia Syros is the third SUV from Kia India, following the Seltos and Sonet.
  • It will feature a boxy design with a bold grille and vertically stacked LED headlights.
  • The upcoming SUV includes advanced safety features, such as ADAS and a 360-degree camera.
  • Powertrain options are expected to include a 1.0-litre turbo petrol engine and a 1.5-litre diesel engine.
  • The expected price range for the Syros is between Rs 9 lakh and Rs 17 lakh (ex-showroom).

“The Syros will compete against the Maruti Suzuki Brezza, Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue, Skoda Kylaq and Mahindra XUV 3X0.”

The introduction of the Kia Syros could significantly shake up the compact SUV market, posing a challenge to existing models with its feature-rich design and competitive pricing.

item.title: Indian-origin CEO thinks he should ‘get a green card’, Elon Musk reacts with one-word answer - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Indian-origin CEO thinks he should ‘get a green card’, Elon Musk reacts with one-word answer

Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Billionaire Elon Musk reacted to an X post by Aravind Srinivas, the Indian-origin CEO of Perplexity AI, regarding his long wait for a green card. Musk's single-word response of "Yes" has gained significant attention on social media.

  • Aravind Srinivas expressed his desire to obtain a green card on X, asking, “I think I should get a green card. Wdyt?”
  • Elon Musk replied simply with "Yes", attracting widespread interest.
  • Srinivas responded to Musk with a red heart emoji and a folded hands emoji.
  • Srinivas is the CEO of Perplexity AI, an AI-powered search engine founded in 2022.
"We have an upside down system that makes it hard for highly talented people to come to America legally, but trivial for criminals to come here illegally." - Elon Musk

The conversation highlights ongoing discussions about immigration policy and its impact on talented individuals in the tech industry. Srinivas, an IIT Madras graduate and former research scientist at OpenAI, has garnered attention for his contributions to AI despite challenges in obtaining citizenship.

item.title: Bhushan Power Insolvency: ED concedes appeal against JSW Steel; Supreme Court orders restitution of attached properties - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Bhushan Power Insolvency: ED concedes appeal against JSW Steel; Supreme Court orders restitution of attached properties

Published on: 15 Dec 2024, 4:35 am

The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has opted not to pursue its appeal against JSW Steel's takeover of Bhushan Power and Steel, resulting in the restitution of assets valued at ₹4,025 crore to JSW Steel under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC).

  • ED decided against appealing to the Supreme Court regarding JSW Steel's acquisition of Bhushan Power.
  • Assets worth ₹4,025 crore were returned to JSW Steel after the Supreme Court’s directive on December 11.
  • Section 32A of the IBC offers immunity from asset attachment if a resolution plan is approved.
  • The ED's previous stance argued that this immunity should not apply retroactively to Bhushan Power.
  • The Supreme Court allowed JSW Steel to take control of the properties while ED retains the right to investigate the former promoters of Bhushan Power.
  • The court clarified that its decision is specific to this case and does not set a precedent for future cases.

“It is further clarified that the Court has not expressed any opinion on the interpretation of Section 32A (2) of IBC or on the powers of the E.D. to attach the property of the Corporate Debtor which is undergoing the Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process...”

The settlement allows JSW Steel to take control of the assets while the ED continues its investigations into the actions of Bhushan Power’s former promoters, highlighting the complexities of insolvency proceedings and asset attachment under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA).

item.description:
Vedanta dividend announcement: Rs 35 paid in FY25! 4th interim dividend declaration tomorrow - Record date

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: ET Now News

Vedanta Limited, headed by Anil Agarwal, is preparing to announce its 4th interim dividend for FY25, bringing good news to its shareholders.

  • Anil Agarwal-led Vedanta is set to announce the 4th interim dividend of FY25 shortly.

  • Shares of Vedanta closed at Rs 519.70 apiece on BSE on December 15, 2024.
“The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is proposed to be scheduled on Monday, December 16, 2024,” - Vedanta announcement.

In FY24-25, Vedanta aims to reward its shareholders with substantial dividend payouts, continuing its tradition of offering high dividend yields.

item.title: Vedanta share dividend 2024: Rs 35 paid in FY25; fresh announcement tomorrow! Check record date - ET Now
item.description:
Vedanta share dividend 2024: Rs 35 paid in FY25; fresh announcement tomorrow! Check record date

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: ET Now News

Vedanta Limited is set to announce its fourth interim dividend for FY25 on December 16, 2024, with a record date set for December 24, 2024.

  • Anil Agarwal-led Vedanta is set to announce the 4th interim dividend of FY25 very soon.
  • Vedanta has also fixed the record date for the purpose.
  • Shares of the company closed at Rs 519.70 apiece on BSE on Friday.
“We wish to inform that due to unforeseen circumstances we withdraw the Notice of Board Meeting proposed to be held on October 9, 2024 and accordingly the Board meeting hereby stands cancelled,” - Vedanta

In total, Vedanta has declared 3 interim dividends worth Rs 35 per share in the current financial year and a dividend yield of 8.85% at the current share price.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment: GMP At 24.36%, A Step-By-Step Guide To Check Allotment Status Online - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment: GMP At 24.36%, A Step-By-Step Guide To Check Allotment Status Online

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

Vishal Mega Mart's IPO is generating significant interest with a strong subscription performance, set to finalize allotment on December 16, and listing on December 18.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to December 13, with a total subscription of 28.75 times.
  • Retail investors subscribed 2.43 times, non-institutional investors 15.01 times, and qualified institutional buyers 85.11 times.
  • The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share.
  • Unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 97, reflecting a premium of 24.36%.
  • Allotment confirmation expected by the evening of December 16; shares will list on BSE and NSE on December 18.

"The GMP has shown steady growth, increasing from the 20.51 per cent recorded at the IPO’s outset."

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO has attracted considerable investor interest, reflected in its subscription rates and GMP, indicating a promising outlook for its market debut.

item.title: Fed meeting among top 5 factors that can sway Sensex, Nifty this week - The Economic Times
item.description:
Fed meeting among top 5 factors that can sway Sensex, Nifty this week

Publication Date: December 13, 2023

Source: Economic Times

Nifty and Sensex continued their positive momentum for the fourth week, with a weekly gain of 0.5%, amidst ongoing consolidation. Market participants are closely watching several key factors that may impact market movements this week.

  • Fed Meeting Outcome: The US Federal Reserve meeting on December 18 is highly anticipated, as a 25 basis point rate cut is expected.
  • Macro Data: Results from the Bank of England and Bank of Japan's monetary policy announcements are also significant, alongside the HSBC Composite, Manufacturing, and Services PMI data.
  • FII Action: Foreign Institutional Investors (FIIs) have shown signs of stability, with purchases amounting to Rs 14,435 crore by December 13.
  • Global Markets: Wall Street displayed mixed results, with slight declines in the S&P 500 and Dow, while the Nasdaq gained momentum.
  • Technical Analysis: A move above 24,800 on Nifty could signal further recovery, with strong support expected in the 24,300-24,400 zone.
"Currently, the market is anticipating a revival in consumer spending, driven by the festive season and year-end holidays," said Geojit's Vinod Nair.

In conclusion, the upcoming Fed meeting and various macroeconomic data releases will be crucial for Sensex and Nifty performance, as the market navigates through these factors amidst a generally positive sentiment.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates - News18
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO: Know Latest GMP, Allotment, and Listing Dates

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

The much-anticipated initial public offering (IPO) of MobiKwik has concluded with impressive subscription numbers and is set for a strong market debut on December 18.

  • The IPO was open for bidding from December 11 to December 13.
  • The IPO received an overwhelming subscription rate of 125.69 times overall, with retail investors at 141.78 times, NIIs at 114.7 times, and QIBs at 125.82 times.
  • MobiKwik’s unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 444, which is 59.14% higher than the upper price band of Rs 279.
  • The allotment will be finalised on December 16, with listing on the BSE and NSE scheduled for December 18.
  • The total size of the public issue is Rs 572 crore, consisting entirely of fresh equity shares.
“As of today, MobiKwik’s unlisted shares are trading at Rs 444 per share, which is Rs 165 or 59.14% higher than the upper price band of Rs 279, signaling a strong debut on December 18.”

Founded by Bipin Preet Singh and Upasana Taku, MobiKwik aims to solidify its position in India’s fintech ecosystem with this IPO.

item.title: Sanjay Malhotra | The new boss at Mint Street - The Hindu
item.description:
Sanjay Malhotra | The new boss at Mint Street

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: The Hindu

On December 9, the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) Governorship changed hands, with Union Revenue Secretary Sanjay Malhotra stepping into the role as Shaktikanta Das prepares to exit. Malhotra's appointment surprised many, marking a departure from traditional appointments within the Finance Ministry.

  • Sanjay Malhotra, a 1990-batch IAS officer, is the new RBI Governor for a three-year term.
  • He holds a degree in computer engineering from IIT Kanpur and a Master’s in Public Policy from Princeton University.
  • Malhotra is described as soft-spoken, affable, and inquisitive, known for engaging conversations about economic issues.
  • Upon taking office, he emphasized a balanced approach to economic issues, prioritizing public interest, growth, stability, certainty, and trust.
  • His previous roles give him insights into taxation and economic trends, suggesting he may approach monetary policy with a unique perspective.
"I do not like to start playing my shots from the first ball of a match... I will put the best foot forward in public interest." - Sanjay Malhotra

As a relatively unknown figure in economic circles, Sanjay Malhotra's governance is anticipated to bring new perspectives to the RBI, particularly amidst ongoing challenges in economic growth and inflation management.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO: Check GMP, Allotment Date, Subscription Status - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO: Check GMP, Allotment Date, Subscription Status

Publication Date: December 14, 2024, 16:35 IST

Source: News18

Unlisted shares of Vishal Mega Mart Ltd are currently trading at Rs 97 per share in the grey market, which is 24.36 per cent higher than the IPO issue price of Rs 78, indicating a decent listing on December 18.

  • The IPO allotment will be finalised on December 16, and the listing on BSE and NSE will occur on December 18.
  • The IPO was available for subscription between December 11 and December 13, receiving an overall subscription of 28.75 times.
  • The retail category saw a 2.43 times subscription, while non-institutional investors portion had a 15.01 times subscription.
  • Qualified institutional buyers subscribed by 85.11 times.
  • The grey market premium (GMP) is currently at 24.36%, indicating solid market interest.
“Grey market premium indicates investors’ readiness to pay more than the issue price.”

The IPO of Vishal Mega Mart is entirely an offer-for-sale (OFS) by promoter Kedaara Capital-led Samayat Services LLP, with no fresh issue of equity shares. The IPO collected Rs 2,400 crore from anchor investors before the IPO’s public offering.
